document_data.name: Ko Dun Kin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ko Dun Kin''' was a [[Shou]] merchant in [[T'u Lung]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History: Ko Dun Kin was a merchant, representative of the mercantile [[Ko clan]] in the town of [[Pe Nok]] in T'u Lung. In 1358 DR, he welcomed his cousin [[Ko La Ko]] and an adventuring party hired by [[Ko Ho San]]. He helped them with their journey to [[H'sin-to]], at the mouth of the [[Fenghsintzu River]]. Possibly they were attacked by [[Dragon Claw]] followers trying to scare Ko Dun Kin.
